member.name: M:DWSIM.Interfaces.IExternalLinearSystemSolver.Solve(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[])
member.summary: Solves a system of linear equations.

member.name: M:DWSIM.Interfaces.IExternalNonLinearSystemSolver.Solve(System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double[]},System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double[0:,0:]},System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Boolean},System.Double[],System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Solves a system of non-linear equations.
member.param: Function which gets the current x values and returns the function values.
Optional. Function which gets the current x values and returns the gradient values.
Function called n each iteration step. First argument is the x-vector, second argument is f-vector. Return true to stop the iterations or false to continue.

member.name: M:DWSIM.Interfaces.IExternalNonLinearMinimizationSolver.Solve(System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double},System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double[]},System.Func{System.Double[],System.Double,System.Boolean},System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Minimizes a black-box non-linear equation.
member.param: Function which gets the current x values and returns the function value.
Optional. Function which gets the current x values and returns the gradient values.
Function called n each iteration step. First argument is the x-vector, second argument is function value. Return true to stop the iterations or false to continue.
member.returns: The solution vector corresponding to the function minimum.

member.name: M:DWSIM.Interfaces.IExternalODESolver.InitializeODEs(System.Func{System.Double,System.Double[],System.Double[]},System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double[])
member.summary: Method that initializes the ODE to solve.
member.param: A function that evaluates the right side of the differential equations.
The initial value for the independent variable.
A vector of size N containing the initial conditions. N is the number of differential equations.

member.name: M:DWSIM.Interfaces.IExternalODESolver.Solve(System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Action{System.Double,System.Double[]},System.Double)
member.summary: Computes the solution of the ordinary differential equations.
member.param: A vector of size N containing the initial conditions. N is the number of differential equations.
The step for the interval of integration (x0, x0+deltax, x0+2*deltax,...,xf).
A delegate where to return the solution.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlashAlgorithm
member.summary: This interface defines the basic properties of a flash algorithm, including an instance of the class which contains its current settings.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlashCalculationResult
member.summary: This interface defines the parameters of a flash calculation result.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlowsheet
member.summary: The IFlowsheet interface is the main interface which should be implemented by the Flowsheet class. It provides direct access to the various flowsheet components and helper functions to manipulate objects.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlowsheetBag
member.summary: This is an interface which provides direct access to collections of flowsheet objects.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlowsheetGUI
member.summary: This is an interface which defines helper functions to a Flowsheet GUI implementation.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlowsheetCalculationQueue
member.summary: This interface defines the calculation queue to be used by the flowsheet solver.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlowsheetNewMessageSentEvent
member.summary: This interface defines an event raised when a new message is sent to the flowsheet log, to be catched by an object when the automation is being done through a COM association.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IFlowsheetOptions
member.summary: This interface defines the flowsheet settings and other properties.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IGraphicObject
member.summary: This interface defines the basic properties for a graphical representation of an object in the flowsheet PFD.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IDynamicsIntegrator
member.summary: This interface defines the basic properties of the Dynamic Mode Integrator.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IMaterialStream
member.summary: This is the interface which defines the basic properties of a Material Stream.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IPropertyPackage
member.summary: This interface defines the basic Property Package funcionality to be exposed for communication between the various DWSIM components. The actual Property Package class exposes much more funcionality through the implementation of other interfaces, including CAPE-OPEN ones.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.IExternalUnitOperation
member.summary: This interface defines the basic properties for a graphical representation of an object in the flowsheet PFD.

member.name: T:DWSIM.Interfaces.ISimulationObject
member.summary: This interface defines the basic properties of Simulation Objects (Unit Operations, Material Streams and Energy Streams)

member.summary: Sets the value of a property.

member.summary: If an Specification object is attached to this object, returns its ID.

member.name: P:DWSIM.Interfaces.ISimulationObject.SpecVarType
member.summary: If an Specification object is attached to this object, returns a variable describing how this object is used by it (target or source).
